name: PacMen Exercise
description: A JavaScript project where PacMen move randomly around the screen. The PacMen change direction when they hit the screen edges. This project demonstrates DOM manipulation and event handling using JavaScript.

name: Eye Exercise
description: An interactive web page where the eyes follow the mouse cursor. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it demonstrates DOM manipulation and event handling in JavaScript.

name: React Tic-Tac-Toe
description: A simple Tic-Tac-Toe game built with React. This project demonstrates the use of React components, props, and state to create an interactive user interface.
